name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程著重英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾.
schedule:
1.   Sept. 8     Course Introduction & Orientation
2.   Sept. 15    Nouns    (derivation & agreement between subject  and verb)
3.   Sept. 22    Pronouns
4.   Sept. 29    Verbs I (tense and forms)
5.   Oct. 6      Verb II (application and identification)
6.   Oct. 13     Auxiliaries
7.   Oct. 22     Adjective & Articles (
8.   Oct. 27     Adverbs & Prepositions
9.   Nov. 3      (Mid-term exam)
10.  Nov. 10     Sentences (Parallel Construction, Dangling Constructions)
11.  Nov. 17     Adverbial Clauses (Nine types)
12.  Nov. 24     Adjective Clauses (Cases & Punctuation)
13.  Dec. 1      Noun Clauses (Usage of Tenses)
14.  Dec. 8      Gerund Phrases & Infinitive Phrases
15.  Dec. 15     Participial Phrases
16.  Dec. 22     Participial Phrases (cont.)
17.  Dec. 29     Review
18.  Jan. 5       (Final exam)
scorePolicy:
1. Full Attendance & Earnest Participation 5%: Anyone with more than three absences from class will receive a failure grade.
2.  Pop Quizzes, Tests, Assignments (35%) – No make-up is allowed.
3.  Mid-term Exam (30%)
4.  Final Exam (30%)
materials:
1.	Frank, Marcella. (1986). Modern English Part I: Exercise for Non-native Speakers. Englewood Cliffs, NJ: Prentice Hall Regents. (Longman)
2.	Frank, Marcella. (2003). Modern English Part II: Sentences & Complex Structures (2nd). Taipei, Taiwan: Pearson Education Taiwan. (Longman)
